== CSS ==

| Combinators | Select                                       |
|-------------|----------------------------------------------|
| A,B         | multiple selector, comma is just a seperator |
| A B         | (descendent selector) 后代, 直接或间接后代   |
| A->B        | (child selector) 直接后代                    |
| A+B         | (adjacent sibling selector) 紧跟着的兄弟元素 |
| A~B         | (general sibling selector) 所有的兄弟元素    |
